title: Learning Objective 2.2
stimulusHtml:
Students explain how and why specific traditions and/or changes are demonstrated in a single work or group of works.

0-1 point

Accurately uses specific evidence to explain how the tomb of the Mughal emperor Humayun influenced the design of the Taj Mahal.
descriptions: Does not accurately use specific evidence to explain how the tomb of the Mughal emperor Humayun influenced the design of the Taj Mahal.
Accurately uses specific evidence to explain how the tomb of the Mughal emperor Humayun influenced the design of the Taj Mahal.

title: Learning Objective 2.2
stimulusHtml:
Students explain how and why specific traditions and/or changes are demonstrated in a single work or group of works.

0-1 point

Accurately explains how the tomb of the Mughal emperor Humayun conveys an Islamic vision of paradise.
descriptions: Does not accurately explain how the tomb of the Mughal emperor Humayun conveys an Islamic vision of paradise.
Accurately explains how the tomb of the Mughal emperor Humayun conveys an Islamic vision of paradise.
